attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to re-introduce National Service ( both miltary and non-military) for the youth of UK (both sexes). It is obvious that the present educational system has failed to socialize our children and that they need a 'rite of passage' a transition period of 18 months from childhood freedom to adult responsibility.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
